1. Dr. Crumble, could you tell us about your journey to becoming a leading scientist in Rocket Science?
2. What inspired you to choose the field of Rocket Science?
3. How do you think your distinctive lisp has affected your communication and interactions with others?

6. How have your numerous patents contributed to the field of Rocket Science?

22. Have you ever felt your work was misunderstood because of your complex scientific lingo?
